Add a HEALTHCHECK instruction to a dockerfile

Source: R/dockerfile-instructions.R
dfi_healthcheck.Rd

Add a HEALTHCHECK instruction to a dockerfile

Usage

dfi_healthcheck(
  dockerfile,
  command,
  interval = NULL,
  timeout = NULL,
  start_period = NULL,
  retries = NULL
)

Arguments

dockerfile

A dockerfile object

command

Health check command

interval

Interval between checks (e.g., "30s")

timeout

Timeout for checks (e.g., "5s")

start_period

Initial grace period (e.g., "5s")

retries

Number of retries

Value

Updated dockerfile object

On this page
